about_the_game:
The blonde girl -- Daisy



Daisy is a new character of Fresh Body.
Daisy's name has a beautiful implication: The blonde girl from the jungle.
She has the same mystery as her name. She was Alice's classmate, but she was born with the Mage's pedigree.

Her Talent



She has a totally different talent for Thomas.
She can learn magic quickly and use magic to attack enemies.
Daisy learned the fireball, with the help of the police.
The monster on the island is not enough to fear.
detailed_description:
The blonde girl -- Daisy



Daisy is a new character of Fresh Body.
Daisy's name has a beautiful implication: The blonde girl from the jungle.
She has the same mystery as her name. She was Alice's classmate, but she was born with the Mage's pedigree.

Her Talent



She has a totally different talent for Thomas.
She can learn magic quickly and use magic to attack enemies.
Daisy learned the fireball, with the help of the police.
The monster on the island is not enough to fear.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.6.6 or later
  • Processor: 1.6 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 8800 or Radeon® HD4800 series, 512 MB of memory
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

name: Fresh Body: Daisy

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/Windows 8/Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.00+ GHz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD5450 or better; 256 MB or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX9.0c compatible sound card and drivers
